bibl.title: Herodotos Recited in the Alexandrian Theatre? A Puzzling Page on Hellenistic Performance (Athen. XIV 620D). [En anglais et en italien.]
bibl.note: I. Hegesias and Hermophantos (K.D.). - II. The Great theatre at Alexandria (K.D.). - III. The occasion of the performance by Hegesias and Hermophantos (R.G.A.). - IV. What did the comedian Hegesias recite (R.G.A.)?
